name: Tianyi (Sky) Yu
title: General Partner
description:
Sky has been an active angel investor since 2015, and an LP of Berkeley Catalyst Fund. Early investor of Lighteligence (unicorn), Xtalpi (unicorn), Butlr and Easy Transfer.
2019 AACYF '30 Under 30', and a member of MIT Alumni Angels Boston. MBA - NYU Stern, BS in Math - BU.
sky@taihill.vc

name: Hongkai He
title: General Partner
description:
Hongkai was a two-time tech founder before joining Taihill. Early investor of Revela (10x exited in 2yr), Cider (unicorn), Kula Bio, CacheDNA, LASE, and Databento.
His non-profit roles include VP of the US-China Health Summit and advisor in Boston Ballet.
MS in IEOR - Columbia University, MS&BS in Math&CS - Sun Yat-Sen University.
hongkai@taihill.vc

name: Jingjing Chai
title: General Partner
description:
Jingjing was a Controller in NorthBridge Partners. Former Co-President of MIT-CHIEF. Former Vice Secretary General of Chinese Culture Promotion Society - Media Lab.
ALM in Finance - Harvard University. 
BS in management - Nanjing University.
jc@taihill.vc

name: Tianmeng Xu
title: Founding Partner
description:
Forbes 60 Outstanding Chinese in North America. Early investor of Xtalpi, InnoCare Pharma, Kula Bio, Transcenta Holding, BioKangtai, JD Logistics, and Kuaishou. She has worked for the China Securities Regulatory Commission, Shanghai Stock Exchange, and Chengwei Capital.
MBA Candidate, and MIA in Economic and Political Development - Columbia University.

name: Xuechen (Robert) Zhao
title: Founding Partner
description:
Forbes 30 Under 30. Robert is a serial entrepreneur in TMT and Biotech industries. An early investor in Bioscience, Xtalpi, Resolute Bio, and Kula Bio.
Founder&CEO of Regenerative Bio backed by IMO Ventures, 5Y Capital, and K2VC.
MS in Management in Entrepreneurial Leadership, Babson College.

name: Mikel Badiola
title: Venture Partner
description:
Mikel has experience working on M&A, business development and International Trade, with a vast network of investors, entrepreneurs and businessmen in Europe and Asia.
MS in Entrepreneurial Leadership - Babson College, BS in Management - Deusto University.

name: David Wang
title: Venture Partner
description:
David is the Co-Founder & CEO of Feellove Capital, an AI hedge fund leveraging SOTA technologies to make strategic investments. He is also an angel investor focused on AI/robotics.
MS in CS - UCLA, BS in CS&Business - UIUC.

name: Xudong Lv
title: Venture Partner
description:
Xudong Lv, is a research scholar focusing on AMO physics. He obtained his PhD at UC Berkeley, BS in physics and BA in economics at Peking University. He is also a serial entrepreneur in tech industry and an NPO leader.
He is the chair of GCEA (Global Chinese Entrepreneurs Alliance) and a board member of CEO (Chinese Entrepreneurs Organization).

name: Xiuya Gang
title: Venture Partner
description:
Xiuya was a data analyst in Hong Kong X-Tech Startup Platform (founded by Sequoia China and top HK universities), supporting investment decisions.
She also has working experience in TechAsia Society and People's Daily Hong Kong.
BS in Economics and Math with minor in Business Studies at New York University.

name: Ricki Huang
title: Venture Partner
description:
Ricki is currently working at Ernest & Young where she is focused on Financial and Risk Management. She was previously an Investment Manager at Skylight Investment and a Portfolio Analyst at Babson Collegeâ€™s fund focusing on the financial sector and REITs.
BS in Entrepreneurship and Finance - Babson College.

name: Fawaz Al Shawwa
title: Venture Partner
description:
Previously worked at Investment Banks in New York, Dubai and Kuwait, structuring and closing Private Equity Real Estate deals. Experience in startup development and investment in the US, Asia and the Middle East. Member of YPO.
MS Entrepreneurial Leadership - Babson College, BA International Relations - Northeastern University.

name: Raed Attia
title: Venture Partner
description:
Currently a Human Capital Consultant at Deloitte, specializing in Organizational Transformation, Change Management, and Workforce Development.
He has extensive experience in digital transformation for clients in Life Sciences as well as Technology, Media, and Telecommunications sectors.

name: Megan Wang
title: Venture Partner
description:
Megan has been passionate about startups since high school when she created a smart AI trashcan and software system. Since then, she has worked with several startups, including Product Growth and Data at Cider and Business Development at Galaxea AI.
BA in Economics & Mathematics - Barnard College, Columbia University.
